about_the_game:
Tavern Talk’s Original Soundtrack is composed by the incredibly talented Filippo Beck Peccoz.

Combining his love for plucked instruments of all sorts, the arts of musical storytelling, and the mysterious world of Asteria created a hauntingly beautiful, immersive soundtrack that brings the world of Tavern Talk to life with these 29 tracks.

To access this content please do the following:

Go to your Steam Library and on the dropdown box just below the search bar on the left-hand side, click on the dropdown arrow and change from GAMES/ALL to SOUNDTRACKS. This will list all of the soundtracks you own on your Steam account. Right-click on Tavern Talk Soundtrack in your Steam game library and choose "Download Album."

Once installed, click on Tavern Talk Soundtrack and all of the songs installed will be listed on the song list to the right of your library screen.
You can also right-click on Tavern Talk in your Steam game library, choose "Properties", click on the "Local Files" tab and choose "Browse...". This will open up your Tavern Talk folder in Steam where you'll find the folder for your Soundtrack.

From there, just run the soundtrack with your preferred audio player, or you can load the song files onto your audio device for listening on the go!
